short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick search the XMODEL Support knowledge base.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search the XMODEL Support knowledge base quickly and easily!
With this extension, you can search for a question or keyword using the following two ways:

  - In the Omnibox: type ‘x’ and press tab key to begin writing your question.
  - From the Context Menu: highlight the keyword and select “Search XMODEL Support for...“.

The search results from the XMODEL Support portal will be displayed in a new tab.
